channel.title: Item deletion on login
channel.description:
how would i make it destroy all the items if they have it?
example: player logs in, is wearing 1 santa, has 20 santas in inv, and 102 santas in bank
how would i make it destroy all of there santas?
if (playerHasItem(1050, 1) { deleteItem(1050, 1); } thats my best guess how would i make it destroy all of there santas if they have em, noted and un-noted in bank, wearing, in inv
rep++ for help

how would i make it destroy all the items if they have it?

example:
